reviews.review:
El otro día estaba viendo Dragon Ball Z (el cual censuró el ministerio de la mujer) mientras tomaba mi chocolatada libertaria y vi como Freezer atravesaba a Krillin con sus cuernos, mientras lo sodomizaba como me sodomiza la AFIP (agencia Fiscal de Ingresos Públicos) por cada ves que compro un juego en STEAM (Alberto bajame el 64% de impuestos) por lo que decidí ver como se sentía  en carne propia así que me metí en el DBD (Dead By Deadlight) mejor conocido como el AFIP SIMULATOR. El juego consta de 4 supervivientes (probablemente monotributistas) que deben escapar de un killer, el cual es un agente de la AFIP que va a buscar colgarte y en donde los cuelgues son las multas que tenes que pagar por andar haciendo ingresos sin declararlos, ademas de paso cuando te deja colgado podes sentirte como Krillin viendo como tus amigos se quedan haciendo sus generadores mientras vos la miras por TV. 
El objetivo es salir de Argentina que es el escenario donde jugas, por eso todo se ve gris y decadente (levemente Peronista) por medio de encender los generadores (Que son los papeles para salir del país), ademas a eso tenes que sumarle que hay distintos "agentes" que van a tratar de SACRIFICAR tus ahorros, como por el ejemplo el Trampero (que te llena de trabas burocraticas con sus trampas) o el ONI que es el típico Gremialista de camionero que te rompe las piernas por no afiliarte a su gremio, o la enfermera que representa al hospital de berazategui (en el cual entras por un dolor de rodillas y terminas con una ETS) o mi favorito, el campanero que hace cosplay de tu papá (se desaparece) que van a buscar que te quedes con ellos. El problema es que los killers (como los agentes del gobierno) tienen mucha ventaja por encima tuya y siempre te van a poder ganar.
Igualmente no todo es malo, también aprendí que podes unirteles y volverte killer (lo mas abusivo del juego), por lo que cuando te sientas mal por Krillin pensa que si el tuviera cuernos haría los mismo.
很好玩，我已经推荐朋友玩了

this game is fun to play with friends thats it apart from that dont bother they also removed playing as a killer with friends as a proper game you now have to do custom games which if you are new is really daunting because of the amount of perks there are and half of them arent even good or are just way too overpowered playing as a survivor is fun but its not fun when your team mates sell you out to the killer or the killer camps the hooked survivors and 1 by 1 your entire team gets wipedout especially with the undetectable perk as the killer when you stand still you become undetectable from all survivors so it makes unhooking friendly teammates a nightmare and playing as the killer if all 4 players are still alive they can all rush the hook with flashlights constantly blinding you and not being able to do anything cause survivors keep moving back and fourth between objects so they can stay alive and its just toxic ive been really into this game and i havent found many games that are too good but when i started getting to level 10 and higher i suddenly found that every survivor match i got into ultimately was not fun and left an itch desiring to be scratched i cant reccomend this game to anyone unless you are going to play a very boring game with your friends of hwich you have everything unlocked :)) literally no point to playing the game then at that point this was something great but quickly deteriorated because the games "balancing" isnt balanced
The game meh. Can be fun but so many bugs. Updates create new bugs that are rarely corrected. The real question is, How much patience do you have for waiting for a game company to fix things.

Buen juego, sobre todo para jugar con amigos y divertirse. Si sos una persona que se tiltea fácil, no te lo recomiendo. Si sos una persona que se asusta fácil, dale una chance, con el tiempo te acostumbrás, te lo digo por experiencia. Tiene algunos bugs sobre todo al momento de encontrar partida o al terminar, pero durante el juego todo bien. No tengo nada más que agregar, te mando un beso (?

O jogo tem mecânicas que permitem que os jogadores ajam de má fé. O jogo é definitivamente desequilibrado. Os outros jogadores interferem muito na sua jogabilidade e muitos deles jogam pra estragá-la fora do que o jogo propõe. É um jogo onde você mais passa raiva do que se diverte. Todas essas mecânicas somadas criam um ambiente onde os jogadores se sentem motivados a agirem com desrespeito, inclusive levando esse desrespeito para fora do jogo.

actualizacion: es un juego demierda la verdad que les puedo decir, lo de los asesinos y demas todo bien sus habilidades son buenas en si no es (contrastando con lo que dije ) un mal juego
el problema yase  en que esta balanceado a favor de los survivors por lo cual es imposible ( no tanto pero si te deja mal de la cabeza) jugarte una partida sin que te esten rusheando que te vengan 500 premades que  obiamente estan 24/7 comunicadas 
osea piensenlo un poco 4v1, vos perseguis a 1 y 3 reparan 
no tiene pvto sentido
y lo peor es que los desarrolladores siguen dandoles ventajam a los survis,  PERO POR FAVOR DALE  
minimo pongan en su juego en el apartado informativo que juego de miedo naa juego competitivoooo
por que desde este asqueroso mmr no vas a tener una partida en la cual la pases bien
las cosas como son y es lo que se tiene que decir
es mas te recomikendo que te esperes por vhs o otro similar pues no veo que hagan caso y seguiran hasta ellos solos matar su juego
This game is a lot of fun to play, Ive played this a lot back when I had a PlayStation and it is still very fun to play ! 10/10 would recommend

I personally like DBD even tho it has its flaws. Many bugs, many hacker, survivor / killer sided maps, toxic player, poor handling and bugfixing from BHVR, lack of creative events, licenced dlcs and perks behind a real money paywall. Its fun to unlock other perks and be creative using them nontheless there are meta perks which will stand out depending on the opposite factions playstyle. If you are planning to play mainly survivor, try to play as a group of friends, its way more fun and shouldnt tilt you as much as soloqueue. You may have a rough start understanding the game, the different perks, decision making, how to loop etc. but it will get constantly better as you play.  All in all I mostly enjoy this game.
It has popular trans and gay character Heather Mason so yeah I think it's pretty decent

It's one of if not the most popular asymmetrical multiplayer horror games, and one of the most overrated as well. Go download identity v for free and play that instead if you really want to try out something similar, but I'd stay away from Dead By Daylight. Greedy devs who love to capitalize on FOMO(who doesn't, but these devs do it to an outrageously manipulative degree), poor balancing, poor listening and tweaking to player feedback, extremely toxic fanbase(though you will have nice moments maybe 1/50 matches), mandatory "skill based matchmaking" which ends up "fairly" pairing you with pubstompers or literal Ipad babies who decided to go on their siblings' computer one day, poor accessibility options(though blowing up their twitter got [b] only [/b]colorblind people some options... yay), about 100000↑↑↑↑↑↑↑10 years of grinding if you wish to 100% the game(and their fix to this was removing bonus points that 2 perks gave and adding a convoluted system that looks cool on paper but ultimately is pretty useless to lessen the grind), and the list could go on and on. Damn near every hour I've spent playing this game has been frustrating and terrible, but the couple fun or silly moments have kept me in like a slot addict. 1/10, stay away from it.

Needs more basement bubba.

Survivor is very easy, especially with friends.

Killer is fun until you hit the invisible MMR barrier, after that just go watch Otzdarva or get clowned for 20 games.
10/10 punched my right headset because of AMAZING TEAMMATES and going against AMAZING KILLERS that doesn't CAMP or TUNNEL.
bhvr pior empresa do mundo odeio muito eles
This game is fun, as long as you are not toxic and just focuses on having fun :D there are salty players, but don't let them rub off on you. This is a trove of memes and fun times xD

If your not a pussy like me then youll have fun being a survivor but im too scared so i only play killer, But it is really fun, If you want a specific killer i recommend you get a dlc. But yeah its fun and not scary unless your a survivor.

Главная проблема  игра - это отсутствие баланса, между выжившими и маньяком, когда обе стороны играют хорошо, то все решают генраш, когда за 3 минуты тебе дают 3-4 генератора, а если ты пытаешься их ломать, то это занимает 3 секунды, сурв притронется за 1 секунду и геник не откатывается, также генератор не теряет прогресса от удара по нему без чертика, нужно фиксить генраш, имбалансные перки, орешек, осколок, часы, ты даже кемпить не можешь, ибо прибегают 2-3 человека спасать выжившего и подставляются под удары, чтобы более менее комфортно догонять, нужно покупать DLC, убийц, навыки, в игре полно абузных мест, где сурв может водить тебя минутами, через окно, если у тебя нет  перка розыгрыша, разработчики убивают игру еще дальше, вводя тотем на хил для всей команды, который можно ставить бесконечно, сурвы хилятся с ним за 10 секунд, также до самого вечера за маньяка ты ищешь игру от 2 до 7 минут, что очень долго, в игре полно читеров, которые просто не дают тебе играть, багов, когда анимация отображает выжившего на твоем плече и ты ни с чем не можешь взаимодействовать, выжившие бывает ломают 2 ближайших крюка, и ты просто не можешь повесить упавшего сурва, по кд слепят фонариками, хотя ты отворачиваешься, пинг для России ужасный 75-100, когда ты пробиваешь сурва, то идет звук и анимация, но каким - то образом там орешек прожался, хотя ты вплотную к спине был, однозначно не стоит покупать данную игру, вы зря потратите нервы, время, деньги

В целом в это играть можно, но нет. Баланса не существует, мишки фредди нету( Мне лично через 4 часа игры уже надоело бегать по карте и чинить ебаные генераторы, я даже задонатил в эту помойку чтобы купить нового харизматичного перса, но гейплей от этого почти не поменялся. Я все так же бегаю от маньяка и чиню генераторы, изредка находил так называемые тотемы на этом персонаже. Если вам нету во что поиграть, то впринципе можете купить разве что по скидочке.
P.S: Cтранно что до сих пор у этой игра нету конкурентоспособный игры.

Most people who enjoy this game develop a love/hate relationship with it. Save yourself the rage and don't buy it. The developers continue to support toxicity in the community and just care about pouring out cosmetics rather than fixing the game.
A game that grabs you from the beginning. Really fun if you have others to play with and can communicate. Developers are constantly trying add new survivors and killers to the maps .

okay game is super cool and stuff but i will tell you this, you will regret the day you buy this game. its crazy fun but like the community is very 2-face. very fun sweet people but they will lash out at you any time you do anything "toxic". also this game drains your money dont ask me why, it seems like theres always dead by daylight money available (buying skins or chapters). But like those are the only negatives, im going to be completely honest this is an amazing game, never seen before, 10/10.

Look at how many hours ive played.

If your'e looking for a multiplayer game that's different from the rest since they're all shooters or very similar, consider adding this to your library, lots of fun and lots of replayability since there are tons of killers to choose from and go against and a lot of perks and skins to make every survivor unique.

A big plus is the devs, the game is not new by any means but the devs are constantly adding new killers, new maps and refreshes to the game to never let it feel stale.

Recomendo comprar quando estiver em promoção, é um game divertido pra jogar em coop ou sozinho mesmo, as desvantagens são que o game tem muitos bugs e a maior parte da comunidade de players que joga isso é um bando de sequelado mentalmente e ideologicamente por isso prefiro jogar sem call na maior parte do tempo, mas os bugs e os sequelados da pra relevar numa boa, se minerar bastante e usar um bom filtro da pra conhecer algumas pessoas legais jogando esse game, no geral o game é divertido.
Норм игра но с дискордными генрашами они не когда не разберутся думаю.
